pr_title: Linkage Monitor not to show stacktrace when it finds new errors

timeline.bodyText: This fixes the immediate issue. Looking at this now though, I don't think this should be an exception at all. It is not an exceptional or unexpected condition, anymore than a compiler noticing a syntax error would be. We might want to change this to a return value as a list of linkage errors or some such thing.
timeline.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: Updated LinkageMonitor.run to return new problems.
replies.author: suztomo

timeline.author: suztomo
